Title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Actors: Jim Carrey, Liam Aiken, Emily Browning, Kara Hoffman
Plot: Three children - Violet, Klaus and Sunny Baudelaire - are left orphaned when their house burns down, with their parents in it, in mysterious circumstances. They are left in the custody of a distant relative, Count Olaf (played by Jim Carrey). It is soon apparent that Count Olaf only cares about the children for their large inheritance.
Production: DreamWorks SKG, Paramount Pictures, Scott Rudin Productions, Nickelodeon Movies
